Articles.Content:
i've got a story, and a video. so you know the KSP2 trailer?

of course you do, this is the KSP forum.

I was so wowed and astonished by it I almost immediately began work on making a tribute to it with Scratch. Sadly the project was too time extensive and had several annoying technical issues so it could not be completed, and has an annoying wait at the beginning to get the song working properly due to Scratch 3.0 being an absolute idiot. I decided to share it anyways, and it is now 1/3 as long as it should be. I'm very proud of it nonetheless and I'd enjoy it if you provided constructive feedback for what I did make (and please don't criticize the technical stuff going on at the beginning, blame Scratch, not me)

If you're still interested link to my version is below.
https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/328776179/
feel free to watch if you like.
Wow, I thought everyone on scratch was a 3rd grader making a stupid pong knockoff but, you did something awesome

5 hours ago, SpaceFace545 said:

Wow, I thought everyone on scratch was a 3rd grader making a stupid pong knockoff but, you did something awesome 

Thanks! Most of my projects don't make it past the WIP phase and are often ergo broken, but i do some pretty cool stuff according to my friends
